TEXT.English: DAWN OF A CIVILIZATION
TEXT.Chinese: DAWN OF A CIVILIZATION

TEXT.English: It is the year 1776 AD. Discontent with foreign domination, the people in the American colonies have risen up in revolution to found their own nation. However, their fledgling republic is still in danger of being reclaimed by European colonial powers and has to surpass its former masters to fulfill its manifest destiny.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1776年的第一缕阳光照耀着北美十三州。不满足于外国人的统治，北美殖民地的人民起来为建立自己的国家而革命。然而，他们羽翼未丰的联邦仍然有被欧洲列强颠覆的危险，他们必须全面超越他们以前的宗主国，以实现他们天赋的使命。

TEXT.English: It is the year 622 AD. The founding of Islam unites the Arabian people under the banner of the Caliphate. Arabia's direct neighbors, the Byzantine Empire and Sassanid Persia, are weakened from their recent wars. It is the right time to expand the House of Islam into their wealthy possessions, forming a melting pot of cultures that will bring culture and science to new heights.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元622年的第一缕阳光照耀着红海之滨。伊斯兰教的创立，使得阿拉伯各部落团结在真主的旗帜下。而在阿拉伯的近邻，拜占庭帝国和萨珊波斯王朝因为旷日持久的战争而两败俱伤。现在，正是扩大伊斯兰教影响力的天赐良机。阿拉伯的文化和科技成就将达到一个新的高度，并为后世留下宝贵的财富。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1810 AD. Spurred by the weakness of the Spanish Empire and the ideals of the French Revolution, the people in the Viceroyalty of the Rio de la Plata have overthrown their viceroy and started a revolution to form the Argentine Republic.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1810年的第一缕阳光照耀着拉普拉塔河口。在西班牙帝国处于衰落中的情况下，受到法国大革命精神的鼓舞，拉普拉塔总督区的人民推翻了西班牙总督的统治，并开始为建立阿根廷共和国而奋斗。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1195 AD. The Aztec peoples have founded the city of Tenochtitlan at Lake Texcoco in the Valley of Mexico. Through clever use of irrigation systems, Tenochtitlan can become the largest metropolis of Mesoamerica and dominate the surrounding cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1195年的第一缕阳光照耀墨西哥高原。在墨西哥峡谷深处的特斯科科湖上，阿兹特克人建立了自己的都城，特诺奇蒂特兰。通过先进的灌溉技术，特诺奇蒂特兰将成长为中美洲最大的城市，并使周围城邦一一归顺。

TEXT.English: It is the year 3000 BC. The fertile crescent of Mesopotamia is home of the first urbanized cultures in the history of mankind and known as the cradle of civilization. Though the cities of Sumer and Akkad are thriving, with the emergence of Babylon, they will soon be overshadowed by the greatest metropolis of its time.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前3000年的第一缕阳光照耀在两河流域。美索不达米亚肥沃的土地，是人类历史上第一个城市化文明的摇篮。虽然目前苏美尔和阿卡德的城市欣欣向荣，但是不久，他们的光芒就将被当时世界上最伟大的城市――巴比伦所掩盖。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1822 AD. After the revolution in Portugal threatens Brazilian sovereignty with in the United Kingdom, Dom Pedro of Brazil declares an independent empire. Brazil's rich plantations as well as the Amazon rainforest promise wealth for the future, but also demand preservation.
TEXT.Chinese: 1822年的第一缕阳光照耀着里约热内卢。葡萄牙国内的革命动摇了它在巴西的殖民统治，巴西的佩德罗王子宣布巴西为一个独立王国。巴西富饶的种植园以及亚马逊的热带雨林保证了其日后的财富来源，但这也需要悉心的保护。

TEXT.English: It is the year 330 AD. With the Roman Empire threatened by Barbarian invasions from the east, it becomes evident that the Empire cannot be governed from Rome alone. So Constantine the Great has founded Constantinopolis as a "New Rome", in hopes that the Eastern Empire will be able to withstand these incursions and eventually restore the glory of the Roman Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元330年的第一缕阳光照耀着君士坦丁堡，罗马帝国正不断受到来自东方的蛮族威胁，显然这个庞大的帝国已经不能单由罗马城管辖。于是，君士坦丁大帝建立了君士坦丁堡，并将这座城市认为是“新罗马”，藉此希望这个东部的帝国能够抵挡住蛮族的入侵，并重现罗马帝国昔日的辉煌！

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. After the death of Justinian, most of his successes have been unmade again. While the Lombards took Northern Italy and the Danube could be barely held against the Slavs, Byzantium was also plunged into a war against Sassanid Persia. Its victory proved Pyrrhic, and now the Empire is economically and militarily weakened.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元600年的第一缕阳光照耀着君士坦丁堡。在查士丁尼大帝死后，他生前的大部分努力成果均付之东流。意大利北部被伦巴第同盟夺去，多瑙河防线在斯拉夫人的猛攻下苦苦支撑，同时，拜占庭帝国还被卷入了与萨珊波斯王朝之间旷日持久的战争，虽然勉强取胜，但损失惨重。现在，这个帝国在经济和军事上陷入了捉襟见肘的窘境......

TEXT.English: It is the year 1867. After the American revolution, Canada has remained under colonial control. With the approval of the North America Acts, Canada has now been finally granted independence so it can expand across the Great White North on its own accord.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 1867. After the American revolution, Canada has remained under colonial control. With the approval of the North America Acts, Canada has now been finally granted independence so it can expand across the Great White North on its own accord.

TEXT.English: It is the year 3000 BC. China is the easternmost region of the world where human civilization first develops. Through the dynasties of Xia, Shang and Zhou, cities develop mainly in the vicinity of the Yellow River, and the concept of a "Mandate of Heaven" is invented to legitimize the rule of the Middle Kingdom of China through the ages.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前3000年的第一缕阳光照耀在黄河之滨。在人类文明的萌芽阶段，中国就好比是世界的最东方。自夏商周三代，城市如雨后春笋般出现于黄河之岸；同时，“天命”开始逐渐被君王们用来证明自己统治的合法性。

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. After the Han Dynasty had collapsed, civil war between the Chinese kingdoms ensued. Only 11 years ago Emperor Wen of Sui managed to reunite China and reclaim the Mandate of Heaven. But the power of the Sui Dynasty is not completely consolidated, and the old challenges of China remain.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元600年的第一缕阳光照耀在华夏大地。随着多年以前汉王朝的崩溃，中国各地内战连绵不绝。仅仅十一年前，隋文帝登上帝位并重新统一了中国，但新生的政权并不稳固，众多的挑战仍横亘在中国发展的道路上。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. After the Ming Dynasty has collapsed under peasant revolts, the Jurchens of Manchuria have conquered China and established the Qing Dynasty. With Manchuria and Tibet under imperial control, China has reached the greatest extent in history, and the rule of the Kangxi Emperor promises another golden era.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 1700 AD. After the Ming Dynasty has collapsed under peasant revolts, the Jurchens of Manchuria have conquered China and established the Qing Dynasty. With Manchuria and Tibet under imperial control, China has reached the greatest extent in history, and the rule of the Kangxi Emperor promises another golden era.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1390 AD. The Kingdom of Kongo emerges after the unification of several tribal polities in the Congo delta just when European powers start to expand their influence in Africa. It must try to keep its independence by both religious and economic means.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1390年的第一缕阳光照耀着刚果盆地。就在欧洲势力开始在非洲扩大他们的影响之时，刚果三角洲的几个部落政权联合了起来，刚果王国由此孕育。它必须通过宗教和经济手段试图来维持它的独立性。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Continued warfare with the Portuguese and internal rebellions have weakened the Kingdom of Kongo to the point of effective colonization. The kingdom is still lagging behind scientifically and economically, and often the slave trade remains as the only viable source of income.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着刚果盆地。葡萄牙人和当地部落武装之间不断的冲突，使得刚果王国得以避免完全沦为殖民地。虽然如此，这个王国仍然在科技和经济方面大大落后于整个世界，同时，贩卖奴隶几乎成为了王国唯一的收入来源。

TEXT.English: It is the year 3000 BC. The Egyptian civilization coalesces under the recent unification of the Kingdoms of Lower and Upper Egypt. The fertile banks of the Nile make Egypt one of the wealthiest regions of the world. It is time to use this wealth to build monuments and establish a culture the world has never seen before.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前3000年的第一缕阳光照耀着尼罗河两岸。在上埃及和下埃及王国统一并合并之后，埃及文明诞生于尼罗河流域的沃土之上。肥沃的尼罗河三角洲将使埃及成为世界上最富饶的区域之一。现在，他们要用这些财富创造出世所未见的文化，以彰示后人。

TEXT.English: It is the year 829 AD. After the migration of Germanic peoples to Britain, the island has been divided between several Celtic, Norse and Anglo-Saxon kingdoms. Now the King of Wessex has been crowned Bretwalda and thus ruler of all of England. Now unified, the English people can turn their eyes from their island across the sea and gain rule of the waves.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元829年的第一缕阳光照耀着英伦诸岛。在大量日耳曼人定居大不列颠岛后，这座岛上星罗棋布着许多凯尔特人、北欧人或是盎格鲁-撒克逊人建立的小王国。现在，威塞克斯王国的国王得到了英格兰霸主的地位；现在，英伦三岛上的居民可以不再仅仅将目光局限于本土，而是乘风破浪，争取海洋的霸权。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Glorious Revolution has restored stability to the British thrones and paved the way to the Acts of Union. With its colonial holdings in the Americas and India growing, the British crown will be able to establish a world-wide empire and challenge the French dominance over Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着英伦诸岛。“光荣革命”确立了英国的君主立宪体制，并为联合王国的成立铺平了道路。伴随着北美以及印度殖民地的飞速发展，英国将会建立一个世界性的帝国，并挑战法国在欧洲的统治地位。

TEXT.English: It is the year 295 BC. The Ethiopian highlands are exceptionally fertile due to its temperate climate, but also quite remote from other civilizations. This changes when the major trade routes between the Roman Empire and Indians shift to the Red Sea, allowing the Ethiopian kingdom of Aksum to flourish.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前295年的第一缕阳光照耀着东非高原。由于温和的气候，埃塞俄比亚高原土地异常肥沃，但却不为其他文明所熟知。但是，当罗马和印度之间的贸易路线转移到了红海沿岸，这种情况发生了变化，阿克苏姆王国自此开始蓬勃发展。

TEXT.English: It is the year 751 AD. After the collapse of the Western Roman Empire, the Merovingian Frankish Empire became the major Christian power in Europe. With the coronation of Pepin from the Carolingian dynasty, the Franks have come another step closer to reclaim Rome's legacy and dominate Christian Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元751年的第一缕阳光照耀着塞纳河。随着西罗马帝国的崩溃，墨洛温法兰克帝国成为了欧洲最主要的基督教势力。随着加洛林王朝的丕平加冕王位，法兰克人又向着自己重现罗马辉煌，主宰基督教欧洲的目标迈进了一步。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. France under the rule of Louis XIV is at the height of its power and the dominating cultural and military power in continental Europe. After extending its borders and winning the Thirty Years War, the impeding end of the Spanish Habsburgs presents another opportunity to expand French power.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着巴黎城。在文化和军事这两个方面，路易十四治下的法国都处于整个欧陆的巅峰。在赢得三十年战争，扩张了自己的领土之后，未来哈布斯堡王朝在西班牙统治的结束，将为法国势力的扩张提供一个新的契机。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1701 AD. Since the Westphalian Peace of 1648, the Holy Roman Empire is nothing but a loose organization of states. While the power of the Emperor concentrates in his Austrian holdings, the Electorate of Brandenburg-Prussia elevated itself to the Kingdom of Prussia, seeking to unite the German nation under its own hegemony.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1701年的第一缕阳光照耀着德意志的土地。自1648年威斯特伐利亚和约签订以来，神圣罗马帝国早已是强弩之末。当帝国的实力集中于奥地利手中时，勃兰登堡-普鲁士侯国自立为普鲁士王国，并在其霸权下开始寻求统一德意志民族的道路。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1600 BC. The first city states emerge on the Greek peninsula. While the division of the Greek civilization might seem as a disadvantage at first, their emphasis on independence favors the inception of new ideas in literature, science and philosophy as well as new tactics in the art of warfare.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前1600年的第一缕阳光照耀在爱琴海上。第一座城市出现在希腊半岛上。虽然看上去希腊文明在一开始显得有些落后，但是他们对文学、科学和哲学的贡献，他们在战争中对阵法的创造，以及他们对自由独立的渴望，都将使他们青史留名。

TEXT.English: It is the year 3000 BC. The river beds of the Indus and Sarasvati provide fertile ground for ancient civilization. With unparalleled sanitation and urban planning, the Indus Valley Civilization centered around the city of Harappa can make use of this fertility and become the most widespread and populous civilization of its time.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 3000 BC. The river beds of the Indus and Sarasvati provide fertile ground for ancient civilization. With unparalleled sanitation and urban planning, the Indus Valley Civilization centered around the city of Harappa can make use of this fertility and become the most widespread and populous civilization of its time.

TEXT.English: It is the year 843 AD. The Treaty of Verdun brings the final separation of the Frankish Empire into West and East Francia. The eastern half is dominated by German peoples, and not only would its German kings break with the Romantic Frankish culture, but also claim its imperial title and the continuation of the Holy Roman Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元843年的第一缕阳光照耀在多瑙河畔。凡尔登条约将法兰克王国分割成东西两半。东半部分为日耳曼人所占据，是为东法兰克王国。这个王国不仅将继承古罗马帝国的文化，还将彰显其伟大的名声并使神圣罗马帝国永世留存。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Despite the setbacks during the Thirty Years War, the victory at the Siege of Vienna allowed the Habsburg Monarchy to drive back the Turks and secure their holdings in the Balkans. The beginning of the Austrian baroque let arts and architecture flourish, but the weakness of the Spanish line may lead to another war soon ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着多瑙河。尽管在三十年战争中铩羽而归，但是维也纳之战中，哈布斯堡王朝击退了土耳其的入侵，并将异教徒的势力暂时控制在巴尔干半岛。奥地利巴洛克时代的开始，使得艺术和建筑都有了显著的发展，但是由于西班牙王位继承权引发的一系列问题，可能很快就要带来一场新的战争。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1150 AD. Manco Capac has just founded the Kingdom of Cuzco, the first Incan kingdom. Even in the harsh environment of the Andes and lacking suitable pack animals, they set out to create an empire never seen before in the Americas.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1150年的第一缕阳光照耀着的的喀喀湖。曼诺・卡帕不久前建立了印加的第一个王国――库斯科王国。安第斯山区环境恶劣且缺乏大型牲畜，但即使如此，他们仍然开创了一个在美洲前所未见的大帝国。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1500 BC. After the collapse of the Harappan civilization, the Vedic Aryans reach the Indo-Gangetic plain. The following Vedic era features the development of a caste system and the Mahajanapada kingdoms, where the most important epics of Indian culture are authored, laying the foundation to transform India into the religious and spiritual center of the world.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前1500年的第一缕阳光照耀着恒河平原。随着哈拉帕文明的崩溃，雅利安人进入了印度河―恒河平原。他们将带来种姓制度，并建立起自己的王国，印度文化的史诗将在这里被不断创作，并为印度成为世界宗教精神的中心打好基础。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Sixteen years ago, Shivaji Bhosle has established the Maratha Kingdom, the first Hindu state to challenge Mughal hegemony over Northern India. With Mughal power declining, now is the time to break Muslim domination of the subcontinent for good.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 1700 AD. Sixteen years ago, Shivaji Bhosle has established the Maratha Kingdom, the first Hindu state to challenge Mughal hegemony over Northern India. With Mughal power declining, now is the time to break Muslim domination of the subcontinent for good.

TEXT.English: It is the year 650 AD. Nearly all of the trade between China and India passes the Strait of Malacca. Benefiting from its position on the nearby island of Sumatra, the Indonesian Kingdom of Srivijaya rises to become a major trading power in Southeast Asia.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 650 AD. Nearly all of the trade between China and India passes the Strait of Malacca. Benefiting from its position on the nearby island of Sumatra, the Indonesian Kingdom of Srivijaya rises to become a major trading power in Southeast Asia.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1167 AD. For too long has Italy been under the rule of German kings, but now the Lombard cities have risen up and thanks to Papal support, achieved de facto independence. The Italian city states, though often feuding with each other, are centers of science, culture and commerce and can now reap the benefits of their skills to usher in a Renaissance of European culture.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 1167 AD. For too long has Italy been under the rule of German kings, but now the Lombard cities have risen up and thanks to Papal support, achieved de facto independence. The Italian city states, though often feuding with each other, are centers of science, culture and commerce and can now reap the benefits of their skills to usher in a Renaissance of European culture.

TEXT.English: It is the year 525 AD. The early Japanese polity centered around the Yamato province is introduced to Buddhism from Korea. This allows the spread of Chinese influences from the Sui and Tang dynasties to Japan, followed by a centralization of power into the Empire of Japan.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元525年的第一缕阳光照耀着富士山。日本列岛上最早的定居者――大和诸部开始兴起。随着佛教从高丽的传入，以及中国隋唐时代文化的广泛影响，中央集权逐渐在日本列岛上形成。

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. The early Japanese polity centered around the Yamato province is introduced to Buddhism from Korea. This allows the spread of Chinese influences from the Sui and Tang dynasties to Japan, followed by a centralization of power into the Empire of Japan.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元600年的第一缕阳光照耀着富士山。日本列岛上最早的定居者――大和诸部开始兴起。随着佛教从高丽的传入，以及中国隋唐时代文化的广泛影响，中央集权逐渐在日本列岛上形成。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Under the Tokugawa Shogunate, Japan has been at peace for almost a century now. But contact with European traders threatens to disturb the achieved balance again, and even the complete seclusion under the Sakoku cannot preserve it forever. Japan will have to open itself to the world ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着富士山。在德川幕府的统治之下，日本列岛已经经历了将近一个世纪的和平。但是欧洲人的到来正在逐渐打破这种平衡，即使是在闭关锁国下完全的隔绝也于事无补。现在，日本必须向世界打开国门……

TEXT.English: It is the year 800 AD. The unpredictable nature of the South East Asian monsoons have so far prevented the formation of a developed civilization in the region. But now, the advanced Khmer water management techniques lead to the foundation of their capital Angkor, facilitating enormous population growth and urbanization.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 800 AD. The unpredictable nature of the South East Asian monsoons have so far prevented the formation of a developed civilization in the region. But now, the advanced Khmer water management techniques lead to the foundation of their capital Angkor, facilitating enormous population growth and urbanization.

TEXT.English: It is the year 50 BC. The three Korean kingdoms of Silla, Baekje and Goguryeo form on the Korean peninsula, the first step of centralization of power away from their predecessor chiefdoms. The Chinese are close; Korea will have to have to adapt their more advanced organization without abandoning its own sovereignty.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前50年的第一缕阳光照耀着朝鲜半岛。朝鲜半岛上的三个王国――百济、新罗和高句丽摈弃了之前的部落酋长制度，向着中央集权制度迈出了第一步。作为中国的近邻，高丽必须在保持自己独立的同时，尽量吸收中国的先进制度。

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. The three Korean kingdoms still thrive and Goguryeo has expanded the influence of Korean civilization into Manchuria. But now that China is reunited again, they have to be careful to protect their independence for the future.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元600年的第一缕阳光照耀着朝鲜半岛，朝鲜半岛上的三个王国兴旺发展，高句丽王国已经开始向满洲扩张自己的领土。但是中国又一次统一了，高丽必须更小心地维持自己的独立状态。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Kingdom of Joseon has faced both invasion from Japan and the Manchu, who now control the entire Chinese Empire. Now a period of relative peace and economic and cultural renaissance has begun, but with two powerful neighbors and Western imperialism on the rise, it can only last for so long ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着朝鲜半岛。朝鲜王国正承受着来自日本和中国清王朝两方面的侵略压力。现在，一段相对和平，文化和经济复苏的时代开始了，但是面对两个强大的邻国，以及遥远西方那些不断发展的势力，我们不知道这个时代能维持多久……

TEXT.English: It is the year 989 AD. Sub-Saharan Africa is still underdeveloped compared to the rest of the old world. But the Mande people control rich gold mines, which has caught the attention of its northern neighbors. Defending against foreign attempts to seize its riches by force, Mali has now the opportunity to truly become the richest civilization on Earth.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元989年的第一缕阳光照耀着尼日尔河。相对于旧世界的其他地区，撒哈拉以南的非洲始终没有得到很好的发展。但是曼丁哥人坐拥高产的金矿，这些财富吸引了它北方近邻们的注意。抵抗外敌入侵，保护自己的财富，马里王国现在有机会成为地球上最富裕的文明。

TEXT.English: It is the year 60 AD. Urbanization on the peninsula of Yucatan sparks the formation of the Mayan city states, whose technological and architectural advancements would create the first advanced civilization in the Americas.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元60年的第一缕阳光照耀着中美洲的雨林，尤卡坦半岛上的城邦联合组成了玛雅城邦联盟，凭借着先进的技术和建筑工艺，他们将建立起美洲大陆上的第一个文明。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1190 AD. For centuries, the peoples of the Mongolian steppe were too divided to pose an actual threat to the world. Now that Temujin has managed to unify all Mongolian tribes under his command, everything has changed, and soon both Orient and Occident will tremble in fear before his armies.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1190年的第一缕阳光照耀着蒙古高原。几个世纪以来，草原上的各个部族，由于太过分散，无法对世界构成大的威胁。但是现在，铁木真已经各个蒙古部族统一起来，一切都改变了。很快，在他攻无不克，战无不胜的精锐骑兵面前，东方国家和西方国家都将绝望地颤栗。

TEXT.English: It is the year 711 AD. The Berbers and Arabs of the Maghreb have crossed the Strait of Gibraltar and defeated the Visigoths to establish the Emirate of Cordoba in Al-Andalus, driving the Iberian Christians to the northern coast of Asturias.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元711年的第一缕阳光照耀着安达卢西亚。居住于北非马格里布地区的柏柏尔人和阿拉伯人早已跨越了直布罗陀海峡，击败了西哥特人，并在安达卢斯建立起了科尔多瓦酋长国，把伊比利亚的基督徒们驱逐到了半岛北部的阿斯图里亚斯地区。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1206 AD. Although Muslim rulers have occasionally raided India for centuries, the foundation of the Delhi Sultanate by Muhammad of Ghor marks the establishment of Islam as a political power on the subcontinent. Their successors, including the Muslim Mughal dynasty, would spread their faith all over India and erect its greatest architectural wonders since ancient times.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1206年的第一缕阳光照耀着恒河平原。尽管印度已被穆斯林统治者们间歇地袭击了几个世纪，但穆罕默德・古尔所建立的德里苏丹国首次象征着伊斯兰政权在南亚次大陆的巩固。以莫卧儿帝国为首的传承者们，将他们的信仰传播至整个印度，并将建造起印度历史上最伟大的建筑奇观。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Mughal Empire has reached its zenith. While culture and architecture are still thriving, Mughal hegemony over India is threatened by the emergence of a sovereign Hindu state in the Marathas and the gains of various European powers on India's coasts.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 1700 AD. The Mughal Empire has reached its zenith. While culture and architecture are still thriving, Mughal hegemony over India is threatened by the emergence of a sovereign Hindu state in the Marathas and the gains of various European powers on India's coasts.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1581 AD. Situated at the confluence of Europe's most important trade routes, the Netherlands are the most populated and wealthiest region of the continent. Far too long this wealth has gone to foreign powers, but now, after long wars, the Dutch people have finally reached independence and established a Republic.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1581年的第一缕阳光照耀在北海东岸。坐落于欧洲最主要的几条贸易路线的交汇之处，尼德兰逐渐成为了这块大陆上人口最稠密，财富最集中的区域。长久以来，这些财富掌握在外国人的手里，但是现在，经过长期的斗争，荷兰人终于取得了独立，并建立起自己的共和国。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Since their independence at the end of the Eighty Years war, the Netherlands have entered a Golden Age and become the European center of trade, industry, culture and science. This wealth however has created envy in the rising neighboring powers of France and Great Britain, and the Dutch will need to keep their colonial empire together to maintain their wealth.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着阿姆斯特丹。自从八十年战争结束而获得独立以来，荷兰经历了一个黄金时代，并成为了欧洲的贸易、工商业科学以及文化中心。然而，这些财富也同样招来了邻近的法国和英国的嫉妒。同时，为了保有这些财富，荷兰必须维持一个庞大的殖民帝国。

TEXT.English: It is the year 844 BC. Persia has always been home to warlike peoples, but now the Achaemenid dynasty provides them with the unifying force to form an organized empire. While the Persian plateau is not particularly wealthy, it has rich and defenseless neighbors in India in the east and Mesopotamia in the west to conquer on their way to become the world's greatest empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前844年的第一缕阳光照耀着伊朗高原。长期以来，波斯人一直被认为是尚武的游牧民族，但是现在，阿契美尼德王朝的建立给了他们一个机会。伊朗高原地区土地略显贫瘠，然而在他的东方和西方，分别是富饶而不设防的印度和美索不达米亚。征服他们，开创一个世界上最强大的帝国！

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Safavid Dynasty, which has ruled Persia since 1500 AD, is losing authority over its territory. The time is ripe for a competent warlord to seize control and humiliate the neighboring Turks, Uzbeks and Mughals ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着伊斯法罕城。自1500年以来一直统治着伊朗高原的萨菲王朝，正在渐渐失去他的威信。伊朗人民期待一位伟大的君主，带领他们羞辱乃至征服紧邻的土耳其，乌兹别克，莫卧儿……

TEXT.English: It is the year 1200 BC. Foreign invasions have weakened the Mesopotamian kingdoms, allowing the Phoenician city states to achieve independence. With the neighboring lands dominated by more powerful civilizations, the Phoenicians have turned their eyes to the west, seeing the opportunity to gain wealth by trade on the Mediterranean Sea.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前1200年的第一缕阳光照耀着苏尔城。外族入侵逐渐削弱了美索不达米亚平原上几个分裂的小王国，这给了腓尼基城邦一个独立的机会。附近的土地都被更强大的文明所统治，腓尼基人将目光转向西方，寻找着通过地中海贸易获取财富的机会。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1025 AD. After the Christianization of the West Slavs in 966, the first Polish ruler is coronated as king. Fertile lands promise urban growth, while pagan neighbors to the north and declining Orthodox polities to the east offer opportunities for expansion.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1025年的第一缕阳光照耀着维斯瓦河。自公元966年西斯拉夫人皈依基督教以来，第一个波兰统治者加冕为王。肥沃的土地给予城市发展的保证，同时北方的异教邻邦和东方日益衰败的东正教政权给波兰的壮大提供了机遇。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Cossack uprisings and the Swedish deluge have severely weakened the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, and the decentralized political system is incapable of reform. Encircled by the growing powers of Prussia, Austria and Russia, the very independence of Poland is in danger ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀在华沙上空。哥萨克以及瑞典的入侵严重破坏了波兰-立陶宛联邦的稳定性，松散的政治体系已经无法适应这个动荡的局面。处于不断壮大的普鲁士、奥地利以及俄国的三国包围之下，波兰民族的独立地位正变得岌岌可危……

TEXT.English: It is the year 1000 BC. Polynesian settlers have migrated to the Tongan and Samoan islands. With their exceptional navigational skills, they can reach and settle even the most isolated islands in the South Pacific Ocean around them.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 1000 BC. Polynesian settlers have migrated to the Tongan and Samoan islands. With their exceptional navigational skills, they can reach and settle even the most isolated islands in the South Pacific Ocean around them.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1128 AD. Portugal has just defeated Spain and gained independence. Situated at the western end of Europe, the kingdom is in an excellent position to send ships to ports all over the world and control the trade of all of Europe, Africa and Asia.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1128年的第一缕阳光照耀着欧洲之角。葡萄牙在不久前击败了西班牙取得了独立，这个坐落于欧洲最西端的文明拥有得天独厚的地理优势，它可以将它的船只派往世界各地，并掌控欧亚非三大洲的贸易。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. In the last century, Portugal has regained its independence from the Spanish crown. Many of its colonial possessions have been lost to the Dutch, but Brazil is still under Portuguese control and promises wealth for the future.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着欧洲之角。在上个世纪，葡萄牙从西班牙的统治之下脱离出来，重获独立。它的许多殖民地都在战争中被荷兰占领，但是巴西仍在葡萄牙控制之下，并将在未来为之提供大量财富。

TEXT.English: It is the year 753 BC. The Latin people have just founded the city of Rome. Situated at a favorable position and governed by a superior political system, it is fated to control the whole Italian peninsula. Most of its neighboring regions in Europe are still barbaric and uncivilized. The city of Carthage is its only rival on the way to rule and civilize the whole Mediterranean.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前753年的第一缕阳光照耀在台伯河畔。拉丁部落在不久前建立了罗马城。他们坐拥优越的地理环境，拥有先进的政治制度，他们注定要控制整个亚平宁半岛。当时，欧洲的大多数其他地区都尚未开化，迦太基城邦将是罗马人控制整个地中海区域道路上的唯一障碍。

TEXT.English: It is the year 860 AD. Varangian travelers among the amber road between Scandinavia and Byzantium begin to set up states along their routes. Quickly mingling with their Slavic subjects, they would become the Rus and set out to settle the vast areas of Eastern Europe and beyond.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元860年的第一缕阳光投射在东欧的白桦林上。瓦拉几亚的游牧民族开始沿着北欧与拜占庭之间的琥珀之路建立他们自己的国家。他们与当地的斯拉夫原住民迅速融合，建立罗斯公国，并着眼于整个东欧，甚至更遥远的广阔领土。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Under the rule of Peter the Great Russia is on the path of modernization. Sweden has just been defeated and the foundation of Sankt-Peterburg secured a window to the east for Russia. With the advance into Siberia, the Russian Empire is now the largest in the world.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着圣巴西尔教堂。在彼得大帝治下的俄国，终于开始了西化的进程。对于瑞典的胜利以及圣彼得堡的建立，为俄国打开了一扇面向西方的窗户。同时，伴随着对西伯利亚的开发，俄罗斯帝国成为了世界上领土最辽阔的国家。

TEXT.English: It is the year 718 AD. Arabs from the Ummayad Caliphate have overrun almost all of Iberia and put an end to Visigoth rule. Now the Spanish Kingdom of Asturias is founded in the mountainous north, seeking to restore Christian control over Iberia and expand it beyond.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元718年的第一缕阳光照耀着伊比利亚。倭马亚哈里发王朝几乎控制了整个伊比利亚半岛，并终结了西哥特人的统治。但是现在，西班牙的阿斯图里亚斯王国建立于北部的多山地区，正在为基督教势力重新控制伊比利亚而奋斗。当然，他们的目标绝不仅局限于此。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Spanish Empire is in a state of decline. Income from the American colonies is diminishing, the cultural flourishing of the last century has come to an end, and now the ruling Habsburg dynasty is about to die out. The conflict over the Spanish succession is about to consume Europe ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着卡斯蒂利亚。曾经不可一世的西班牙帝国正处于不断的衰落之中。从美洲殖民地获取的收入正在不断流失，上个世纪繁荣昌盛的文化活动也走到了尽头。现在，哈布斯堡王朝对于西班牙的统治似乎将要结束，由西班牙王位继承权所引发的冲突将会使整个欧洲卷入其中……

TEXT.English: It is the year 300 BC. With the development of their Sangam literature, the Tamil culture rises to the south of India. Their position close to both China and Rome as well as the availability of valuable spices have made the local dynasties of the Cheras, Pandyans and Cholas affluent centers of trade.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年的第一缕阳光照耀在德干高原。随着桑伽姆文化的发展，泰米尔文化开始在印度南部快速发展。临近中国和罗马这一得天独厚的地理位置，以及极具价值的香料资源，使得当地的哲罗, 潘地亚以及注辇王朝成为富庶的贸易中心。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Since the decline of the Vijayanagara Empire in the 16th century, the Kingdom of Mysore has been the dominant power in the southern Deccan, resisting Mughal expansion. With the appearance of the Marathas and the British, the power structure in India has shifted, requiring Mysore to defend its sovereignty again.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 1700 AD. Since the decline of the Vijayanagara Empire in the 16th century, the Kingdom of Mysore has been the dominant power in the southern Deccan, resisting Mughal expansion. With the appearance of the Marathas and the British, the power structure in India has shifted, requiring Mysore to defend its sovereignty again.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1350 AD. The collapse of the Khmer Empire has allowed the Thai people to claim hegemony over South East Asia. They were able to raze the Khmer capital of Angkor and found their own kingdom west of it, in Ayutthaya.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1350年的第一缕阳光照耀在大城上空。高棉帝国的崩溃为泰人提供了在东南亚证明自己统治力的契机，他们将摧毁原来的高棉国都吴哥，并在它的西面建立起自己的王朝――大城王朝。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. With excellent relations with the new European powers in South Asia and controlling one of the largest cities in the world, the Kingdom of Ayutthaya is in an advantageous condition. However, the threat from their Burmese neighbors is beginning to grow and even the Europeans might consider colonization ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀在大城上空。由于与新近染指南亚的欧洲势力不错的关系，控制着世界上最大城市的大城王朝正处于一个相对有利的状态之下。然而，邻近的缅甸王国所产生的威胁正在不断增加，欧洲人也不会放弃对这里的殖民……

TEXT.English: It is the year 630 AD. The Tibetan clans around Lhasa have been united, and the current weakness of the neighboring Chinese Tang and Indian Pala empires opens the opportunity to expand your empire from the Tibetan highlands and spread Buddhist teaching in the whole world.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元630年的第一缕阳光照耀着青藏高原。居住在拉萨附近的藏族部落开始联合起来，与此同时，唐王朝和波罗王朝的衰败给吐蕃带来了向邻邦开疆扩土，并把佛教教义传播至世界各地的良机。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1280 AD. After the collapse of the Seljuk Empire, the Anatolian Turks are divided into several small Beyliks. However, Byzantium is weakened itself, and now that the Osmanli Beylik is in the hands of a strong leader, a Turkish Ottoman Empire seems close. With the Bosphorus right within their grasp, they have the opportunity to form an empire that stretches over three continents.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1280年的第一缕阳光照耀着安纳托利亚。随着塞尔柱帝国的崩溃，安纳托利亚高原上出现了许多小部族。与此同时，拜占庭帝国也已是苟延残喘。而奥斯曼部族正被一个强有力的领袖所带领，看来，一个奥斯曼帝国的时代即将到来。博斯普鲁斯海峡几乎已是囊中之物，他们将建立起一个地跨三大洲的庞大帝国。

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. With the defeat at the Siege of Vienna, the military expansion of the Ottoman Empire has come to an end and it is on the defensive against the growing power of Austria and Russia. This change in the balance of power leads to increased cultural contact and exchange with the Europeans and a flowering of Ottoman culture.
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着博斯普鲁斯海峡。在维也纳城下受挫之后，奥斯曼帝国的武力扩张进程走到了终点，它不得不在与不断崛起的奥地利以及俄罗斯的对抗中处于防守地位。这种变化将导致欧洲与奥斯曼帝国文化上的交流不断加深。

TEXT.English: It is the year 551 AD. The scarcity of food makes the inhabitants of Scandinavia excellent sailors that rely on fishing and trade. Their home kingdoms still can't sustain further population growth, and the Vikings have to turn to lands across the sea. Not only the coasts of the North Sea, but also the Mediterranean and even the New World make good targets for plunder or settlement.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 551 AD. The scarcity of food makes the inhabitants of Scandinavia excellent sailors that rely on fishing and trade. Their home kingdoms still can't sustain further population growth, and the Vikings have to turn to lands across the sea. Not only the coasts of the North Sea, but also the Mediterranean and even the New World make good targets for plunder or settlement.

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. The scarcity of food makes the inhabitants of Scandinavia excellent sailors that rely on fishing and trade. Their home kingdoms still can't sustain further population growth, and the Vikings have to turn to lands across the sea. Not only the coasts of the North Sea, but also those of the Mediterranean and even the New World make good targets for either plunder or settlement.
TEXT.Chinese: It is the year 600 AD. The scarcity of food makes the inhabitants of Scandinavia excellent sailors that rely on fishing and trade. Their home kingdoms still can't sustain further population growth, and the Vikings have to turn to lands across the sea. Not only the coasts of the North Sea, but also those of the Mediterranean and even the New World make good targets for either plunder or settlement.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Kingdom of Sweden is the most formidable of the Scandinavian powers and has managed to establish an empire by acquiring Finland. Still, its expansion has also created enemies, and rivals like Denmark-Norway, Poland and especially Russia might seek to curb Swedish power ...
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年的第一缕阳光照耀着波罗的海。目前，瑞典王国是斯堪的纳维亚地区最令人生畏的势力，通过占领芬兰，一个新的帝国正在崛起。当然，不断的扩张也带来了敌人，丹麦-挪威王国、波兰，尤其是俄国，它们都想压制瑞典，并从中分一杯羹……
